question: What are the countries having confidence in national goverment higher than world average in 2022?
query: WITH world_average AS (   SELECT AVG(confidence_in_national_government) AS avg_confidence   FROM world_happiness_report   WHERE year = 2022 ) SELECT country_name, confidence_in_national_government FROM world_happiness_report, world_average WHERE year = 2022 AND confidence_in_national_government > avg_confidence LIMIT 50;
